description:
I've been a long time secureCRT lover and never thought I would find another application that was ever close.

IN COMES TERMIUS

No seriously this application is legit. I will probably pay for it after my trial is over
The program is wonderful. I really liked it. However, unfortunately, it does not have a free plan, even with some restrictions. I give it 3 stars. Otherwise, of course, 5 stars.
